description: Dr. Heinrich`s daughter and Shiro`s love interest. She is an android who can fuse with Schtroheim`s other creation, the giant robot Donau Î±1 (Alpha 1), and battles Mazinger Z in order to fulfill her father`s dream of surpassing Juzo`s creation to become the greatest robot engineer of all. Her story and name seem to be inspired in the German poem Die Lorelei by Heinrich Heine.
name: Lorelei Heinrich
